ai-thag7.5:1.1_0: I broke the reeds off with my hands,
ai-thag7.5:1.2_0: made a hut, and stayed there.
ai-thag7.5:2.2_0: for me to break reeds with my hands.
ai-thag7.5:2.3_0: The training rules have been laid down for us
ai-thag7.5:3.2_0: didn’t see the disease in its entirety.
ai-thag7.5:3.3_0: But now I have seen the disease,
ai-thag7.5:3.4_0: as I’ve practiced what was taught by he who is beyond the gods.
ai-thag7.5:4.1_0: Gotama traveled by that straight road;
ai-thag7.5:4.2_0: the same path traveled by Vipassī,
ai-thag7.5:5.1_0: These seven Buddhas have plunged into the ending,
ai-thag7.5:6.1_0: out of compassion for living creatures—
ai-thag7.5:6.3_0: and cessation, the ending of suffering.
ai-thag7.5:7.4_0: and life comes to an end,
ai-thag7.5:7.9_0: The Book of the Sevens is finished.
